707604f-a.title: Manhattan: 1st Ave. - 41st St.
707604f-a.text:
First Avenue (extreme left) and vicinity, southward from E. 41at Street and Prospect Place (in Tudor City), showing across tenement rooofs the Eledto Company warehouse under construction on the westerly Avernue frontage from 39th to 38th Streets. On the op osite side of thie thoroughfare i the New York Edison Company power hose. 712705f-a.title: Manhattan: 41st Street - 1st Avenue
712705f-a.text:
(1)
41st Street, south side, west from No. 330 between First and
Second Avenues.
May 11, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, not showing much beyond Second Avenue. The Tudor City development has begun, and most of the old houses have
been demolished.
January 24, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
